page.title: 03BELLINGHAM MIDDLE SCHOOL
page.content: The middle school at Bellingham has been in existance since 1974 when the education in Northumberland changed to a tri-partite system.It uses the building provided for the secondary school in 1950.The school has a Head_ master with thirteen teachers and about 250 pupils who attend between the ages of nine and thirteen. They come from all the surrounding villages many travelling up to eighteen miles by bus or taxi.They stay for cash cafeteria or packed{lunch. The pupils learn most{subjects including maths, English,science geography, history, French,music,art, craft and design. They have good outdoor games{facilities}and a gymnasium. The school has a well equipped library,computer room,resource centre, and a television room with video.
